attributes.action: Please recognise Kenny Dalglish's efforts & contributions with a Knighthood.
attributes.background: Kenny's talent on the field speaks for itself.However Kenny's character off the field says it all.Kenny's Charity work & contributions, The Marina Dalglish Appeal, Hillsborough Support, the list goes on.Please recognise & reward Liverpool's 'Canny Scot' with a Knighthood. A true gent & well deserved

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
